update circle_vote set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comments = #{comments,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, shares = #{shares,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, tops = #{tops,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vote_type = #{voteType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, vote_unable_time = #{voteUnableTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vote_count = #{voteCount,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update circle_vote set comments = comments + 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update circle_vote set tops = tops + 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update circle_vote set tops = tops - 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update circle_vote set clicks = clicks + 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update circle_employ set shares = shares + 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
